label.DT_OD_CPC_PROMPT_HEADER: Nice choice. Here is an offer that will make it even better.
label.DT_OD_CPC_LEGAL_COPY: Up to $840 device payment purchase required. Up to $480 trade-in promo credit applied over 24 months; promo credit starts within 1-2 cycles and ends when balance is paid or line terminated/transferred or changed to an ineligible plan. 0% APR. Fully paid off eligible trade-in must be in good working and cosmetic condition.

label.DT_OD_CPC_SINGLE_PLAN_LINE_TITLE: A simple low-cost plan for just one device.

label.DT_OD_CPC_SINGLE_PLAN_LINE_LONG_DESC: Plan includes 1GB data and unlimited talk & text on eligible devices. Need more data? No problem! Additional data can be charged at $10 for each additional GB used.
label.DT_OD_CPC_SINGLE_PLAN_LINE_LEGAL: Extra data avialble at $10 per GB

label.DT_OD_CPC_SHARE_PLAN_LINE_DESC: Choose from 2GB - 100GB data with unlimited talk and text on eligible devices.
